statements: SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT password, username FROM user_credentials WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_credentials;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM user_credentials WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM user_credentials WHERE password IS NOT NULL AND user_id = 5;
SELECT id, username, password FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, id, password FROM user_credentials;
SELECT password, id, username FROM user_credentials;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM user_credentials WHERE username != 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT id, username FROM user_credentials ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_sessions WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, v.start_time FROM user_credentials u JOIN vpn_sessions v ON u.id = v.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_credentials;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM vpn_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM vpn_logs JOIN user_roles ON vpn_logs.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_timestamp FROM vpn_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE r.role_name='admin' ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT u.id, u.username, COUNT(l.log_id) AS log_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN vpn_logs l ON u.id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.username HAVING log_count > 10;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(r.role_id) AS role_count FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING role_count >= 2 ORDER BY role_count DESC, u.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, group_name FROM users JOIN user_credentials ON users.user_id = user_credentials.user_id JOIN user_groups ON user_credentials.group_id = user_groups.group_id;

SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM user_credentials JOIN users ON user_credentials.user_id = users.user_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_credentials.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM user_groups WHERE group_name LIKE 'Admin%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username='admin';
SELECT * FROM user_groups ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, group_id FROM user_credentials WHERE permission_id='123456-7890';
SELECT user_id, username, group_id FROM users JOIN user_credentials ON users.user_id = user_credentials.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections ORDER BY connection_start DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_start, session_end FROM vpn_sessions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT server_name, server_location FROM vpn_servers WHERE server_status = TRUE ORDER BY server_name DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_start FROM vpn_sessions WHERE user_id = 3 AND session_start > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_start ASC;

SELECT users.username, vpn_logs.log_timestamp, vpn_logs.log_message FROM users JOIN vpn_logs ON users.id = vpn_logs.user_id WHERE users.username = 'alice' AND vpn_logs.log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
